abstractText: Streambed particle sizes are measured at 10 points on each main and intermediate transect: at 5%, 15%, 25%, 35%, 45%, 55%, 65%, 75%, 85%, and 95% from the scour line on one side of the stream to the scour line on the opposite side of the stream. See Appendix C for guidance on measuring pebbles at dry transects.
title: Streambed Particle Sizes v1.0
